name: Landscape of Emotion
description:
This interactive generative piece features a landscape of emoji representing a range of human emotion.

Move the mouse around the screen to scroll the landscape endlessly. Move the mouse off of the window or leave it still in the center of the window and the emotional rollercoaster will scroll automatically.

On mobile, tap the screen to indicate the direction to scroll. Tap in the middle to stop scrolling. The piece will scroll automatically after a pause, when stopped.
